snippet.title: PAC-MAN GEO Version 2.0 Update
snippet.description:
PAC-MAN’s world just got a whole lot bigger! Ver. 2.0 for PAC-MAN GEO is here, which brings a bevy of new modes and features to the popular mobile game that uses real-world maps as in-game mazes.

The Ver 2.0 update, which is now live, includes:

“World Tour” Mode
Players can take PAC-MAN on a round-the-world journey through all 24 in-game mazes, each of which showcases the unique charm of a different real-life locale with pristine grids, roads, and roundabouts.

New Skills
To help PAC-MAN navigate the most difficult and complicated maps, players will now be able to utilize new skills like the Vacuum, which can suck Pac-Dots out of tough spots, and Repel, which can help control crowds of ghosts. To celebrate the launch of Ver. 2.0, all players will be given five free uses of the Vacuum!

UI Upgrades
The on-screen size of mazes has been changed to help players better guide PAC-MAN strategically; the home screen and overall designs of maps have also been newly updated.

PAC-MAN GEO is available now as a free download on the Apple App Store and Google Play.
